Package jp.kobe_u.sugar.csp

Class LinearLiteral

  • java.lang.Object
    • jp.kobe_u.sugar.csp.Literal
      • jp.kobe_u.sugar.csp.LinearLiteral
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinearEqLiteral, LinearGeLiteral, LinearLeLiteral, LinearNeLiteral
    public abstract class LinearLiteral
extends Literal
    This class implements a comparison literal of CSP. The comparison represents the condition "linearSum cmp 0".
    See Also:
    CSP, LinearSum

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      LinearLiteral​(LinearSum linearSum, java.lang.String cmp)
      Constructs a new comparison literal of given linear expression.
